# Once UI Documentation

> Comprehensive documentation for Once UI and Magic templates - the open-source design system for indie creators.

## Documentation

- [Get Started](https://docs.once-ui.com/get-started): Complete guide to Once UI templates
- [Quick Start](https://docs.once-ui.com/once-ui/quick-start): Set up your first Once UI project
- [Changelog](https://docs.once-ui.com/changelog): View recent updates and releases
- [Roadmap](https://docs.once-ui.com/roadmap): See what's coming next

## Magic Templates

### Magic Bio

- [Quick Start](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-bio/quick-start): Set up your bio page
- [Links](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-bio/links): Manage your links
- [Profile](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-bio/profile): Customize your profile
- [Analytics](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-bio/analytics): Track link clicks
- [SEO](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-bio/seo): SEO optimization

### Magic Store

- [Quick Start](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-store/quick-start): Set up your store
- [Products](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-store/products): Product management
- [Collections](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-store/collections): Collection management
- [Size Guide](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-store/size-guide): Product sizing
- [Promotions](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-store/promotions): Discounts and offers
- [Mailchimp](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-store/mailchimp): Newsletter integration
- [Styling](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-store/styling): Customize your store
- [Compliance](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-store/compliance): Legal requirements
- [SEO](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-store/seo): SEO optimization

### Magic Portfolio

- [Quick Start](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-portfolio/quick-start): Set up your portfolio
- [Pages](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-portfolio/pages): Configure page routing
- [Content](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-portfolio/content): Manage your content
- [Work](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-portfolio/work): Project showcase
- [Blog](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-portfolio/blog): Blog management
- [Password](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-portfolio/password): Protected pages
- [Mailchimp](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-portfolio/mailchimp): Newsletter integration
- [Styling](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-portfolio/styling): Customize your portfolio
- [SEO](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-portfolio/seo): SEO settings
- [Localization](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-portfolio/localization): Language support

### Magic Docs

- [Quick Start](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-docs/quick-start): Set up your documentation site
- [Pages](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-docs/pages): Configure page routing and access
- [Components](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-docs/components): Documentation components
- [Sidebar](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-docs/sidebar): Automatic sidebar generation
- [Search](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-docs/search): Kbar-powered search
- [Styling](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-docs/styling): Customize your docs
- [SEO](https://docs.once-ui.com/magic-docs/seo): SEO optimization
